title: Taking so long to get to gold x.x
body: Fml swear im going to make it like a week late just like last year -.-

replies.body:
#SmiteAndIgnite
For real though, Silver 2 was super hard for me when I was playing at that rank. It's pretty hard but as long as you keep on keeping on you'll get there. You might need to put in some extra time to get there. 
Good luck in the Fields of Justice and hopefully you can also become Victorious.
lel. dnt give up man... silver 1 is the hardest div imo
